collector:ActOfAggression.NAME: Act of Aggression
collector:ActOfAggression.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:Arrogance.NAME: Arrogance
collector:Arrogance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack this turn applies !M! collector:Doom.

collector:AshesAndDust.NAME: Ashes and Dust
collector:AshesAndDust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL If X is 5 or more, hits two additional times.

collector:BindingCall.NAME: Binding Call
collector:BindingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. Whenever you lose all your Temporary_HP, apply !clm2! collector:Doom to ALL enemies.

collector:Billow.NAME: Billow
collector:Billow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add *Bellow into your hand.

collector:Bellow.NAME: Bellow
collector:Bellow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply collector:Doom equal to unused Block last turn. NL Exhaust.

collector:Bonfire.NAME: Bonfire
collector:Bonfire.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.

collector:BrainDrain.NAME: Brain Drain
collector:BrainDrain.DESCRIPTION: Add the enemy's Collected card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

collector:BramblesparKindling.NAME: Bramblespar Kindling
collector:BramblesparKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted, add a *Strike into your hand and upgrade it !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:CantTouchThis.NAME: Can't Touch This
collector:CantTouchThis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL When you fully block an attack, apply !clm2! collector:Doom to the attacker.

collector:CoffinNail.NAME: Coffin Nail
collector:CoffinNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, return it to your hand next turn with !M! more damage.

collector:CursedWail.NAME: Cursed Wail
collector:CursedWail.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL collector:Afflicted enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

collector:DarkApotheosis.NAME: Dark Apotheosis
collector:DarkApotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the Collected pile for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

collector:DarkLordForm.NAME: Dark Lord Form
collector:DarkLordForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Your Collected cards are played twice.
collector:DarkLordForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Collected cards are played twice.

collector:DarkwoodKindling.NAME: Darkwood Kindling
collector:DarkwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:DoubleTrouble.NAME: Double Trouble
collector:DoubleTrouble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Collected card this turn is played twice.

collector:DragonsTrove.NAME: Dragon's Trove
collector:DragonsTrove.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 Collected cards. NL Gain !M! collector:Reserve. NL Exhaust.

collector:Ember.NAME: Ember
collector:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL When Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: These embers must be lit, not played.

collector:Empower.NAME: Empower
collector:Empower.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength at the start of your next !M! turns.

collector:Extricate.NAME: Extricate
collector:Extricate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, play the top card of your draw pile.

collector:FeelMyPain.NAME: Feel My Pain
collector:FeelMyPain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, a random enemy loses !M! HP.

collector:FiendFire.NAME: Fiend Fire
collector:FiendFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

collector:Finalize.NAME: Finalize
collector:Finalize.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy dies this turn, heal !clm2! HP. NL Apply !M! collector:Doom.

collector:FingerOfDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
collector:FingerOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Only collector:Reserves may be spent on this. NL Apply !M! collector:Doom.

collector:FlameLash.NAME: Flame Lash
collector:FlameLash.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add the Exhausted card's damage to this.

collector:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
collector:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose 1 of !M! cards from your Collected pile to add into your hand.

collector:FuelTheFire.NAME: Fuel the Fire
collector:FuelTheFire.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Next turn, gain !M! collector:Reserve.

collector:Goodbye.NAME: Goodbye
collector:Goodbye.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's collector:Doom. NL Exhaust.
collector:Goodbye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's collector:Doom. NL Exhaust.

collector:GreaterHurting.NAME: Greater Hurting
collector:GreaterHurting.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, replace this with *Greatest *Hurting.
collector:GreaterHurting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, replace this with *Greatest *Hurting+.

collector:GreatestHurting.NAME: Greatest Hurting
collector:GreatestHurting.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, replace this with an *Ember.

collector:GreenGaze.NAME: Green Gaze
collector:GreenGaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a collector:Collected card this turn, gain !B! Block.

collector:Heatwave.NAME: Heat Wave
collector:Heatwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to collector:Afflicted enemies. NL Gain an *Ember.

collector:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, they Retain and are Unplayable.

collector:HoardersStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play the top card of your Collected pile.

collector:Hurting.NAME: Hurting
collector:Hurting.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, replace this with *Greater *Hurting.
collector:Hurting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, replace this with *Greater *Hurting+.

collector:IllTakeThat.DESCRIPTION: Steal up to !M! of the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

collector:LanternFlare.NAME: Lantern Flare

collector:MastersCall.NAME: Master's Call
collector:MastersCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Whenever you play an Attack, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to a random enemy.

collector:MiniCurse.NAME: Mini-Curse
collector:MiniCurse.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.

collector:Misdirect.NAME: Misdirect
collector:Misdirect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.

collector:MysteryWeaving.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Grants 2 less Block for each other card in your hand.

collector:OakbrimKindling.NAME: Oakbrim Kindling
collector:OakbrimKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:Omen.NAME: Omen
collector:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Attacking an collector:Afflicted enemy consumes 1 Weak and Vulnerable. When it does, they lose !M! HP.

collector:ProtectingCall.NAME: Protecting Call
collector:ProtectingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. At the start of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, gain !clm2! Block.

collector:Pyromancy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.

collector:RagingCall.NAME: Raging Call
collector:RagingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL At the end of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to ALL enemies.

collector:ReceiveTribute.NAME: Receive Tribute
collector:ReceiveTribute.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Choose 1 of !M! Boss cards and add it into your hand. It gains Retain. Exhaust.

collector:RotwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray

collector:SeedOfDoubt.NAME: Seed of Doubt
collector:SeedOfDoubt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! collector:Doom. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, if this is in your hand, increase its collector:Doom by !clm2!.

collector:ShadowDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Collected card played this combat. NL Exhaust.

collector:SomberShield.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain a copy of the Exhausted card.

collector:SparkStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Ember into your hand.

collector:SpiritLeech.NAME: Spirit Leech
